scripts.text:
select top 10 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(MANDT)),''), ' ') AS MANDT,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ID_MESSAGE)),''), ' ') AS ID_MESSAGE, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(AIM_MATL_NO)),''), ' ') AS AIM_MATL_NO, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ACH_MATL_NO)),''), ' ') AS ACH_MATL_NO, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(BASE_UOM)),''), ' ') AS BASE_UOM, 
'0' as ORD_TYPE,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ORD_NO)),''), ' ') AS ORD_NO, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(DOCU_DATE)),''), ' ') AS DOCU_DATE, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(POSTG_DATE)),''), ' ') AS POSTG_DATE,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(PCODE)),''), ' ') AS PCODE, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(PLANT)),''), ' ') AS PLANT,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(STOR_LOC)),''), ' ') AS STOR_LOC, 
'  ' AS NO_GI_RECS, 
'  ' AS SD_DOCU_NO,
'  ' AS ITEM_NO,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(NO_MATL_DOCU)),''), ' ') AS NO_MATL_DOCU,
ISNULL(ZBC_THEO_WT,0) AS ZBC_THEO_WT,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(MATL_DOCU_YR)),''), ' ') AS MATL_DOCU_YR, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CFRM_NO_OP)),''), ' ') AS CFRM_NO_OP,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CFRM_CNTR)),''), ' ') AS CFRM_CNTR,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CFRM_NO_REVOP)),''), ' ') AS CFRM_NO_REVOP, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CFRM_REVCNTR)),''), ' ') AS CFRM_REVCNTR, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_HEAT_NO)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_HEAT_NO,  
'  '  AS ZBC_WT_PER_PCS, 
ISNULL(ZBC_WT_PER_COIL,0) AS ZBC_WT_PER_COIL, 
ISNULL(ZBC_ACT_COI_WT,0) AS ZBC_ACT_COI_WT, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_SHIFT)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_SHIFT,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_MILL_SOURCE)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_MILL_SOURCE, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_LENGTH)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_LENGTH,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_STANDARD)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_STANDARD, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_PCS_PER_HEAT)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_PCS_PER_HEAT,
'  '  AS ZBC_NO_OF_CUT,
'  '  AS ZBC_NO_OF_BEND,
'  '  AS ZBC_NO_OF_LINK,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_WT_PER_BLD)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_WT_PER_BLD,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_PCS_PER_BLD)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_PCS_PER_BLD,
ISNULL(ZBC_COU_DIA_1,0) AS ZBC_COU_DIA_1,
ISNULL(ZBC_COU_DIA_2,0) AS ZBC_COU_DIA_2,
'  '  AS ZBC_COU_TYPE_1,
'  '  AS ZBC_COU_TYPE_2,
'  '  AS ZBC_MAC_NO, 
'  '  AS ZBC_COIL_NO, 
'  ' AS ZBC_COU_GRA, 
'  ' AS ZBC_COU_TRF,
'  ' AS ZBC_NO_OF_END,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_COU_DIA_1)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_COU_DIA_1, 
ISNULL(ZBC_AREA_PER_PC,0) AS ZBC_AREA_PER_PC,
ISNULL(ZBC_WT_PER_PC_MESH,0) AS ZBC_WT_PER_PC_MESH,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_COU_DIA_2)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_COU_DIA_2, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_NO_OF_PNT)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_NO_OF_PNT, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ZBC_TAG_NO)),''), ' ') AS ZBC_TAG_NO, 
ISNULL(QUANTITY_D,0) AS QUANTITY_D,
'  '  AS ZBC_MAC_TPL, 
'  '  AS ZBC_NO_OF_STR,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(PLANT_D)),''), ' ') AS PLANT_D, 
ISNULL(nullif(STOR_LOC_D,''), ' ') AS STOR_LOC_D,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(MATL_NO_D)),''), ' ') AS MATL_NO_D,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CHARG_D)),''), ' ') AS CHARG_D,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(SHIFT)),''), ' ') AS SHIFT,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(REV_STATUS)),''), ' ') AS REV_STATUS,
'  '  AS PROD_STATUS,
STATUS, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ERROR_CD)),''), ' ') ERROR_CD,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(NIS_MESSAGEID)),''), ' ') NIS_MESSAGEID,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(PROD_DATE)),''), ' ') PROD_DATE,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CUT_PER_TON)),''), ' ') CUT_PER_TON,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(BEND_PER_TON)),''), ' ') BEND_PER_TON,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(LINK_PER_TON)),''), ' ') LINK_PER_TON,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONSUME_BATCHES)),''), ' ') AS CONSUME_BATCHES,
'  '  AS BAT_LOCATOR_A, 
'  '  AS BAT_LOCATOR_B, 
'  '  AS BAT_LOCATOR_C, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(CON_MAT)),''), ' ') AS CON_MAT,
REC_TYPE
FROM [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] 
WHERE STATUS = 'A'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [MANDT] as MANDT
     ,[CHARG] as CHARG
     ,isnull(AIM_MATL_NO, ' ') as AIM_MATL_NO
     ,isnull(ID_MESSAGE, ' ') as ID_MESSAGE
     ,isnull(ACH_MATL_NO, ' ') as ACH_MATL_NO
     ,Isnull (TOT_QTY, '0') as TOT_QTY
     ,isnull(BASE_UOM, ' ') as BASE_UOM
     ,' ' as AUART
     ,isnull(ORD_NO, ' ') as ORD_NO
     ,isnull(DOCU_DATE, ' ') as DOCU_DATE
     ,isnull(POSTG_DATE, ' ') as POSTG_DATE
     ,[PCODE] as PCODE
     ,[PLANT] as PLANT
     ,[STOR_LOC] as STOR_LOC
     ,'    ' as NO_OF_GI_REC
     ,'          ' as VBELN
     ,' ' as POSNR
     ,'          ' as MBLNR
     ,' ' as MJAHR
     ,' ' as RUECK
     ,' ' as RMZHL
     ,' ' as REV_RUECK
     ,' ' as REV_RMZHL
     ,isnull(ZBC_HEAT_NO, ' ') as ZBC_HEAT_NO
     ,isnull([ZBC_THEO_WT],0.000) as ZBC_THEO_WT
     ,isnull([ZBC_SHIFT],' ') as ZBC_SHIFT
     ,Isnull (PROD_DATE, '') as PROD_DATE
     ,isnull(ZBC_MILL_SOURCE, ' ') as ZBC_MILL_SOURCE
	 ,isnull(ZBC_LENGTH, ' ') as ZBC_LENGTH
     ,isnull(ZBC_STANDARD, ' ') as ZBC_STANDARD
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_A
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_B
     ,' ' as Z_BAT_LOCATOR_C
     ,isnull([ZBC_PCS_PER_HEAT],' ') as ZBC_PCS_PER_HEAT
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_BLD],0.000) as ZBC_WT_PER_BLD
     ,isnull([ZBC_PCS_PER_BLD],' ') as ZBC_PCS_PER_BLD
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_PCS],0.000) as ZBC_WT_PER_PCS
     ,isnull([ZBC_WT_PER_COIL],0.000) as ZBC_WT_PER_COIL
     ,isnull([ZBC_ACT_COI_WT],0.000) as ZBC_ACT_COI_WT
     ,'        ' as Z_MAC_NO
     ,'        ' as Z_COIL_NO
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_CUT
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_BEND
     ,' ' as Z_TOTAL_LINK
     ,isnull([CUT_PER_TON],0.00) as CUT_PER_TON
     ,isnull([BEND_PER_TON],0.00) as BEND_PER_TON
     ,isnull([LINK_PER_TON],0.00) as LINK_PER_TON
     ,'        ' as Z_COU_GRA
     ,'        ' as Z_COU_REF
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_END
     ,0.00 as Z_COU_DIA_1
     ,0.00 as Z_COU_DIA_2
     ,' ' as Z_COU_TYPE_1
     ,' ' as Z_COU_TYPE_2
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_PNT
     ,' ' as Z_TAG_NO
     ,' ' as Z_MAC_TPL
     ,' ' as Z_NO_OF_STR
     ,0.000 as Z_AREA_PER_PC
     ,isnull([CON_MAT],' ') as CON_MAT
     ,isnull([CONSUME_BATCHES],' ') as CONSUME_BATCHES
     ,' ' as Z_SHAPE_CODE
     ,' ' as Z_INV_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_WBS1
     ,' ' as Z_WBS2
     ,' ' as Z_WBS3
     ,' ' as Z_BBSNO
     ,' ' as Z_PROD_MARK
     ,0.00 as Z_MW_SPA
     ,0.00 as Z_CW_SPA
     ,' ' as Z_MW_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_CW_LEN
     ,' ' as Z_PIECES
     ,'0' as Z_CW_OVR_HANG1
     ,'0' as Z_CW_OVR_HANG2
     ,'0' as Z_MW_OVR_HANG1
     ,'0' as Z_MW_OVR_HANG2
     ,' ' as Z_BBS_DESC
     ,isnull([PLANT_D],' ') as PLANT_D
     ,isnull([STOR_LOC_D],' ') as STOR_LOC_D
     ,isnull([MATL_NO_D],' ') as MATL_NO_D
     ,isnull([QUANTITY_D],0.000) as QUANTITY_D
     ,isnull([CHARG_D],' ') as CHARG_D
     ,[SHIFT] as SHIFT
     ,' ' as REV_STATUS
     ,' ' as PROD_STATUS
     ,'A' as STATUS
     ,' ' as ERROR_CD
     ,[REC_TYPE] as REC_TYPE
     ,' ' as PROC_TS
     ,[INTERFACE_ID] as INTERFACE_ID
     ,'00000000' as UDATE
     ,'000000' as UTIME
     ,'BGDJOBS' as USERID
     ,' ' as NDS_SALE_ORDER
     ,' ' as ORDER_ITEM
     FROM [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] where status='T'

select top 10 INTERFACE_ID,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(MANDT)),''), ' ') AS MANDT,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ID_MESSAGE)),''), ' ') AS ID_MESSAGE, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(AIM_MATL_NO)),''), ' ') AS AIM_MATL_NO, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ACH_MATL_NO)),''), ' ') AS ACH_MATL_NO, 
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(BASE_UOM)),''), ' ') AS BASE_UOM, 
STATUS,
ISNULL(nullif(LTRIM(RTRIM(ORD_TYPE)),''), ' ') AS ORD_TYPE, 
REC_TYPE
FROM [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] 
WHERE STATUS = 'A'

text.value: update [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] set status='Y' where status='T' and CHARG= @{pipeline().parameters.CHARG} and ID_MESSAGE= @{pipeline().parameters.ID_MESSAGE};
update [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] set status='E' where status='T' and CHARG= @{pipeline().parameters.CHARG} and ID_MESSAGE= @{pipeline().parameters.ID_MESSAGE};
update [dbo].[T_NSA_GR] set status='T' where status='E' and CHARG= @{pipeline().parameters.CHARG} and ID_MESSAGE= @{pipeline().parameters.ID_MESSAGE};
